entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as wailing and holding her hands over her face to disguise the absence of tears. She is also mentioned as wanting to tell Harry something important.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as knowing that Hermione's actions are not out of anguish but to disguise the continued absence of tears.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is described as having a sudden resurgence of excitement and demanding answers from Hermione.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as being the one who ordered the development of a weapon against the Ministry.

relationships.description: Hermione wanted to tell Harry something important.
Umbridge demanded answers from Hermione about what they wanted to tell Harry.
Dumbledore ordered the development of a weapon against the Ministry.

Umbridge grabbed Hermione's shoulders to shake her slightly.
Umbridge showed interest in the weapon and asked what it was.
